mapper.update: update sb_box_info set agc_idx = #{agc_idx}, agc_sto_idx = #{store_idx}, alias = #{box_name}, description = #{description}, cate = #{cate}, regdate = #{regdate} WHERE box_idx = #{box_idx}
mapper.select:
SELECT info.agc_idx, info.agc_sto_idx as store_idx, info.box_idx, info.alias as box_name, info.description, info.cate, box.serial, box.id as box_id, box.status, box.serial, store.store_name, store.store_num, agency.company_name as agency_name, info.regdate
FROM sb_box_info as info JOIN sb_box as box ON info.box_idx = box.idx JOIN agency_store as store ON info.agc_sto_idx = store.idx JOIN agency as agency ON info.agc_idx = agency.idx ORDER BY info.box_idx

SELECT info.agc_idx, info.agc_sto_idx as store_idx, info.box_idx, info.alias as box_name, info.description, info.cate, box.serial, box.id as box_id, box.status, box.serial, store.store_name, store.store_num, agency.company_name as agency_name, info.regdate
FROM sb_box_info as info JOIN sb_box as box ON info.box_idx = box.idx JOIN agency_store as store ON info.agc_sto_idx = store.idx JOIN agency as agency ON info.agc_idx = agency.idx
WHERE 1=1
AND agency.idx = #{agc_idx}
AND store.idx = #{store_idx}
AND store.store_num LIKE CONCAT('%', #{store_num}, '%')
AND box.status = #{status}
AND box.id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{box_id}, '%')
AND info.alias LIKE CONCAT('%', #{box_name}, '%')
AND info.regdate >= str_to_date(#{regdate1}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND info.regdate <= str_to_date(#{regdate2}, '%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY info.box_idx
